review: Doctor was excellent in approach and response . Reception ppl though too many there not responsive and I dnt find any use in booking appointment in Practo which is not respected in clinic made me to wait 1hr. Instead I would have went directly . Registration fee 100 not informed by practo . I paid 400

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is a talented and efficient doctor to perform your IVF and aligned treatment to bring your dream of being parent a truth. He has a strong team of support in his centre.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
I was totally amused by his behaviour with the patient, by his treatment, by his hospitality. After all he(Dr. Arun Sir) is a great man/Dr. ever I seen.
May Allah bless him with the best and also pray to Allah for his long life from my heart.
Beside this the environment of his hospital's residential area is the best in this world. ** ** ***** ** ***** ***** ** ** ******** ** **** ***** **** ******* **** **** ** ********** *** *** ********* **** ** ** **** ********** 
I want to add another name, Mr. Orindom Chattergee(my dear Dada) after Arun sir. He is also a nice man. He always extended his hand for the best of the patient. Wish you all the best. I can never forget both of you.

The best hospital I have ever seen for infertility treatments..Taking care of patients as their own family members..Especially during the peak rainy day in Chennai history,Dr.ARUN came in time for my embryo transfer which shows their sincerity, care and concern towards the patients.. Also the staff working in all departments are so kind and moral support to the patients.i am very thankfull to all...

Great.,first he listens and   makes us feel very comfortable , we get a feeling as if we are interacting with our close friend or a family member.
Every discussion he handles with at most care ., always gives his best and  under any situation  leaves no stone unturned. Our Best wishes. Shyamala umashankar

He is kind speaker and good his treatment was very satisfied  when I meet him I got confidence so overall I suggest him for the people

Iswarya gives very high success rates. Most of the patients get pregnancy and go with the baby. I did 4 IVF cycles in other centre. But failed. Finally I got twin female baby at ISWARYA fertility centre. Thanks to ISWARYA and team.
Dr.ARUN is a very knowledgeable, kind doctor! He tells the truth, and make sure to keep us informed on each and every part of the process. Thanks to iswarya
Iswarya fertility centre is one of the best fertility centre in Chennai. Amount of IVF treatment is reasonable.
Diagnosis of the problem is excellent and the treatment for the problem is good. The way care provided also good.
Iswarya hospital is the best fertility centre. Treatment cost is affordable. I highly recommended ISWARYA hospital to infertility couples
One of the best hospital in Chennai which is very affordable and offered me nice care. Doctors and nursing care are good and kind.

He is very expressive and explaining everything in layman level. Also anytime he will be responding our queries. Staff are courtesy and cordial. Environment is neat and tidy. Thank you very much for your services.
Very good and patient friendly. But the treatment process can be explained in detail  before the start of the process.
Iswarya fertility centre is one of the best centre in tamilnadu. Most of the patients get pregnancy and go with the baby. I would highly recommend Dr.arunmuthuvel of ISWARYA fertility centre.
Good doctor very caring for his patients, good IVF treatment facilities  all doctors and staff very nice
I am happy with doctor's service. He has cleared all my doubts with my entire satisfaction. Moreover he is attending our queries over mail.
He gave good advice and all the staffs are caring and they are taking care while on emergency....nice experience.... Good
We are thankful to Dr.ARUN and  Dr. Chàndràlekha madam. We felt very comfortable and happy stay. Definitely I will recommend to my friends and relatives
